upps_impulsivity_survey_10.Description: I tend to give up easily.

upps_impulsivity_survey_11.Description: When I am in great mood, I tend to get into situations that could cause me problems.

upps_impulsivity_survey_12.Description: I am not one of those people who blurt out things without thinking.

upps_impulsivity_survey_13.Description: I often get involved in things I later wish I could get out of.

upps_impulsivity_survey_14.Description: I like sports and games in which you have to choose your next move very quickly.

upps_impulsivity_survey_16.Description: When I am very happy, I tend to do things that may cause problems in my life.

upps_impulsivity_survey_17.Description: I like to stop and think things over before I do them.

upps_impulsivity_survey_18.Description: When I feel bad, I will often do things I later regret in order to make myself feel better now.

upps_impulsivity_survey_2.Description: I have a reserved and cautious attitude toward life.

upps_impulsivity_survey_20.Description: Once I get going on something I hate to stop.

upps_impulsivity_survey_21.Description: I tend to lose control when I am in a great mood.

upps_impulsivity_survey_22.Description: I don't like to start a project until I know exactly how to proceed.

upps_impulsivity_survey_23.Description: Sometimes when I feel bad, I can't seem to stop what I am doing even though it is making me feel worse.

upps_impulsivity_survey_26.Description: When I am really ecstatic, I tend to get out of control.

upps_impulsivity_survey_29.Description: I tend to value and follow a rational, 'sensible' approach to things.

upps_impulsivity_survey_3.Description: I have trouble controlling my impulses.

upps_impulsivity_survey_30.Description: When I am upset I often act without thinking.

upps_impulsivity_survey_31.Description: Others would say I make bad choices when I am extremely happy about something.

upps_impulsivity_survey_32.Description: I welcome new and exciting experiences and sensations, even if they are a little frightening and unconventional.

upps_impulsivity_survey_33.Description: I am able to pace myself so as to get things done on time.

upps_impulsivity_survey_34.Description: I usually make up my mind through careful reasoning.

upps_impulsivity_survey_35.Description: When I feel rejected, I will often say things that I later regret.

upps_impulsivity_survey_36.Description: Others are shocked or worried about the things I do when I am feeling very excited.

upps_impulsivity_survey_37.Description: I would like to learn to fly an airplane.

upps_impulsivity_survey_38.Description: I am a person who always gets the job done.

upps_impulsivity_survey_4.Description: I generally seek new and exciting experiences and sensations.

upps_impulsivity_survey_40.Description: It is hard for me to resist acting on my feelings.

upps_impulsivity_survey_41.Description: When I get really happy about something, I tend to do things that can have bad consequences.

upps_impulsivity_survey_42.Description: I sometimes like doing things that are a bit frightening.

upps_impulsivity_survey_43.Description: I almost always finish projects that I start.

upps_impulsivity_survey_44.Description: Before I get into a new situation I like to find out what to expect from it.

upps_impulsivity_survey_45.Description: I often make matters worse because I act without thinking when I am upset.

upps_impulsivity_survey_46.Description: When overjoyed, I feel like I cant stop myself from going overboard.

upps_impulsivity_survey_47.Description: I would enjoy the sensation of skiing very fast down a high mountain slope.

upps_impulsivity_survey_48.Description: Sometimes there are so many little things to be done that I just ignore them all.

upps_impulsivity_survey_49.Description: I usually think carefully before doing anything.

upps_impulsivity_survey_5.Description: I generally like to see things through to the end.

upps_impulsivity_survey_50.Description: When I am really excited, I tend not to think of the consequences of my actions.

upps_impulsivity_survey_51.Description: In the heat of an argument, I will often say things that I later regret.

upps_impulsivity_survey_52.Description: I would like to go scuba diving.

upps_impulsivity_survey_53.Description: I tend to act without thinking when I am really excited.

upps_impulsivity_survey_54.Description: I always keep my feelings under control.

upps_impulsivity_survey_55.Description: When I am really happy, I often find myself in situations that I normally wouldn't be comfortable with.

upps_impulsivity_survey_56.Description: Before making up my mind, I consider all the advantages and disadvantages.

upps_impulsivity_survey_58.Description: When I am very happy, I feel like it is ok to give in to cravings or overindulge.

upps_impulsivity_survey_59.Description: Sometimes I do impulsive things that I later regret.

upps_impulsivity_survey_6.Description: When I am very happy, I cant seem to stop myself from doing things that can have bad consequences.

upps_impulsivity_survey_60.Description: I am surprised at the things I do while in a great mood.

upps_impulsivity_survey_7.Description: My thinking is usually careful and purposeful.

upps_impulsivity_survey_8.Description: I have trouble resisting my cravings (for food, cigarettes, etc.).
